column4: Can someone help me get my screen resolution and compisiting working? I'm having trouble with GRUB and X...
I tried Ask Ubuntu but no one is responding and I'm in a bit of a hurry... http://askubuntu.com/questions/175074/how-do-i-adjust-the-resolution-on-an-hp-g6-laptop
Yes, I looked in Displays and my native resolution of 1366x768 is not listed, only 1024x768
it probably means you don't have the correct driver installed
